properties.entry: SELECT JAVACHIP_CODE, WORK_HOUR, REMAIN_VACATION, WORK_STATUS, ARRIVE_INFO, LEAVE_INFO, WORK_SCHEDULE FROM ATTENDANCE_INFO

UPDATE ATTENDANCE_INFO
SET ARRIVE_INFO = ?, LEAVE_INFO = TRUE
WHERE JAVACHIP_CODE = 1

UPDATE ATTENDANCE_INFO
SET LEAVE_INFO = ?
WHERE JAVACHIP_CODE = 1

UPDATE ATTENDANCE_INFO

WHERE JAVACHIP_CODE = 1
UPDATE ATTENDANCE_INFO SET WORK_STATUS = ? WHERE JAVACHIP_CODE = 1
